title: Leaked images show alleged 35W Dual USB-C Power Adapter from Apple
content:
Last week 9to5Mac exclusively revealed that Apple is working on a new 35W Dual USB-C Power Adapter to let users recharge two devices at the same time. Now alleged images of this new accessory have leaked on the web showing a slightly different design compared to other power adapters from Apple.

moreâ€¦

The post Leaked images show alleged 35W Dual USB-C Power Adapter from Apple appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: 9to5Mac exclusively revealed that Apple is working on a new 35W Dual USB-C Power Adapter, and now leaked images show the product.
